    • Method Detail

      • isChildOf

        public boolean isChildOf(WrapImpl wrap,
                         LeafBlockWrapper leaf)

      • isChildOf

        public boolean isChildOf(WrapImpl wrap,
                         LeafBlockWrapper leaf,
                         FormatterIterationMonitor<java.lang.Boolean> iterationMonitor)

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the following state of the current wrap object:
        • 'firstEntry' property value is set to null;
        • 'firstPosition' property value is set to '-1';
        • 'isActive' property value is set to 'false';

      • getParent

        public WrapImpl getParent()
        Allows to check if single wrap is registered for the current wrap and return it in case of success.
        Returns:
        single wrap registered as a parent of the current wrap if any; null if no wraps or more than one wrap is registered as a parent for the current wrap

      • getIgnoreParentWraps

        public final boolean getIgnoreParentWraps()

      • ignoreParentWrap

        public void ignoreParentWrap(WrapImpl wrap,
                             LeafBlockWrapper currentBlock)
        Allows to mark given wrap as 'ignored' for the given block. I.e. 'false' will be returned for subsequent calls to isChildOf(WrapImpl, LeafBlockWrapper) with the same arguments.
        Parameters:
        wrap - target wrap
        currentBlock - target block for which given wrap should be ignored

      • getChopStartBlock

        public LeafBlockWrapper getChopStartBlock()

      • setActive

        public void setActive()
        Performs the following changes at wrap object state:
        • 'firstEntry' property value is dropped (set to null)
        • 'isActive' property value is set (to true)

      • setWrapOffset

        public void setWrapOffset(int startOffset)
        Applies given value to the 'firstPosition' property value if it's value is undefined at the moment (has negative value).
        Parameters:
        startOffset - new 'firstPosition' property value to use if current value is undefined (negative)

      • getWrapOffset

        public int getWrapOffset()
        Returns:
        'firstPosition' property value defined previously via setWrapOffset(int) if any; '-1' otherwise

      • getType

        public final WrapImpl.Type getType()

      • isWrapFirstElement

        public final boolean isWrapFirstElement()
        Allows to check if current wrap object is configured to wrap first element. This property is defined at constructor during object initialization and can't be changed later.
        Returns:
        'wrapFirstElement' property value

      • saveChopBlock

        public void saveChopBlock(LeafBlockWrapper current)

      • isActive

        public final boolean isActive()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • ignoreParentWraps

        public void ignoreParentWraps()
        Allows to instruct current wrap to ignore all parent wraps, i.e. all calls to isChildOf(WrapImpl, LeafBlockWrapper) return 'false' after invocation of this method.
        Specified by:
        ignoreParentWraps in class Wrap
        See Also:
        Wrap.createChildWrap(Wrap, WrapType, boolean)
